translations: n.燃烧；（化学）氧化，（化学）燃烧；骚动

phrs.translation: 内燃机；燃烧机；内燃机燃烧机
燃烧过程的控制，燃烧控制

sentences.sentence: You might say, "Well, gee, why don't we just power our cars with hydrogen placed on an internal combustion chamber."
sentences.translation: 你可能会说：“好吧，哎呀，为什么我们不把氢气放在汽车内部的燃烧室，来驱动我们的汽车呢。”

sentences.sentence: The combustion of larger molecules, which have multiple carbon-carbon bonds, involves a more complex series of reactions.
sentences.translation: 具有多重碳-碳键的大分子的燃烧涉及到一系列更复杂的反应。

sentences.sentence: In his application, Selden described a machine with a gasoline-driven, combustion-type engine that sat in front of the driver.
sentences.translation: 在他的申请中，塞尔登描述了一种有汽油驱动的燃烧式发动机的机器，它就在司机的前面。
